title: Redmi 13 5G, Orchid Pink, 6GB128GB  India Debut SD 4 Gen 2 AE  108MP Pro Grade Camera  6.79in Largest Display in Segment

script.hook: Tired of missing those perfect shots? Meet the Redmi 13 5G!
script.pitch: Unleash your creativity with a stunning 108MP camera and a vibrant 6.79-inch display that brings every detail to life!
script.features: Capture breathtaking moments with pro-grade clarity, enjoy lightning-fast performance with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2, and stay powered all day with our massive 5030 mAh battery!
script.cta: Don’t wait! Elevate your smartphone experience today for just ₹12,598!
visual_cues: Scene 1: Product showcase with a dynamic rotation of the Redmi 13 5G in Orchid Pink
Scene 2: Close-up shots of the camera capturing vibrant images and the display showcasing vivid colors
Scene 3: A happy customer using the phone in various settings, smiling as they take photos
Scene 4: Bold text overlay with the price and a 'Shop Now' button

metadata.product_title: Redmi 13 5G, Orchid Pink, 6GB128GB  India Debut SD 4 Gen 2 AE  108MP Pro Grade Camera  6.79in Largest Display in Segment
